name: sb-mig
description: CLI to rule the world. (and handle stuff related to Storyblok CMS)

scripts.checkAndBuild: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.publish:patch: npm run checkAndBuild && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm run checkAndBuild && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: npm run checkAndBuild && npm version major && npm publish
scripts.version: conventional-changelog -p eslint -i CHANGELOG.md -s && git add CHANGELOG.md

author: Marcin Krawczyk <marckraw@icloud.com>
